text: Vladimir Filat (born 6 May 1969), commonly referred to as Vlad Filat (), is a Moldovan businessman and politician. He was the founder of Liberal Democratic Party of Moldova. He was the Prime Minister of Moldova from 25 September 2009 to 25 April 2013. He also was appointed as the Interim President of Moldova in 2010. Filat was released from jail in December 2019, 6 years earlier than his initial sentence. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Moldova Category:Presidents of Moldova Category:Moldovan businesspeople
title: Vlad Filat
